## **Best Series on Netflix UK: TV shows to watch on Netflix in May 2018**

**If you’re looking for a new TV show to watch on Netflix this month, you’ve
come to the right place. We’ve rounded up all of the shows making their way
onto the platform in May 2018, as well as everything leaving. Here’s the
score.**

netflix-films-uk-2018-3462979)**

##  **Best TV Series on Netflix UK: New shows arriving on Netflix in May
2018**  

### ![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

including _Case Closed, Love Island, Men Behaving Badly, Prime Suspect,
